ja418:1.6: okaṃ na vijahāmase → okaṃ na vijjahāmase (sya1ed, sya2ed); okantaṃ na jahāmase (mr)
ja418:2.2: bhecchati → bhejjati (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); bhindati (mr)
ja418:8.3: Ayamantimā pacchimā gabbhaseyyā → ayaṃ hi me antimā gabbhaseyyā (bj, pts-vp-pli1); ayamantimā pacchimagabbhaseyyā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
